reasoning: Myocardial ischemia reported as acute incidence. Global average approximately 125 per 100k per year (varies from ~200-250 in high-income countries to 50-100 in developing regions). Based on WHO 2005 cardiovascular disease estimates.
source: WHO Cardiovascular Disease Report 2005; Rosamond W et al. (2008). Heart disease and stroke statistics. Circulation. 117(4):e25-e146
